SELECT id, name, rank_code FROM member WHERE status NOT IN ('퇴사', '휴직') ORDER BY rank_code

SELECT al.seq, al.approval_id AS approvalId, al.approver_id AS id, m.name AS name, m.rank_code AS rank_code, al.status AS status, al.approver_order AS orderNo, CASE WHEN al.approver_order IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS referenceFlag FROM approval_line al JOIN member m ON al.approver_id = m.id WHERE al.approval_id = #{_parameter} ORDER BY referenceFlag, al.approver_order

SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM approval_line WHERE approval_id = #{approvalId} AND status = 'Y'
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM approval_line WHERE approval_id = #{approvalId} AND approver_order IS NOT NULL AND status != 'Y'
SELECT approver_id FROM ( SELECT approver_id FROM approval_line WHERE approval_id = #{approvalId} AND status = 'N' AND approver_order IS NOT NULL ORDER BY approver_order ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT d.* FROM approval_doc d JOIN approval_line l ON d.seq = l.approval_id WHERE d.status = 'WAIT' AND LOWER(TRIM(l.approver_id)) = LOWER(TRIM(#{_parameter})) AND NVL(l.status, 'N') = 'N' AND l.approver_order = ( SELECT MIN(approver_order) FROM approval_line WHERE approval_id = d.seq AND NVL(status,'N') = 'N' AND approver_order IS NOT NULL ) ORDER BY d.writeDate DESC

SELECT d.*, 'P' AS myStatus FROM approval_doc d JOIN approval_line l ON d.seq = l.approval_id WHERE d.status IN ('WAIT','PROCESSING') AND LOWER(TRIM(l.approver_id)) = LOWER(TRIM(#{_parameter})) AND NVL(l.status, 'N') = 'N' AND l.approver_order > ( SELECT MIN(approver_order) FROM approval_line WHERE approval_id = d.seq AND NVL(status,'N') = 'N' AND approver_order IS NOT NULL ) ORDER BY d.writeDate DESC
